entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Rockies. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
